short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to change New Tab page to your specific URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to change New Tab page to your specific URL
Instead default start page chrome://newtab this extension allow you customize URL of new tab page. Override new tab URL. It's like browser.newtab.url, previously available in Firefox.

Size: 5 kB








With this extension you can change the page which is shown when opening a new tab. Set your favorite site like a start tab page. Also, you can build and set your own start page from local disk. Just create it and set full path, for example, file:///C:/MyNewTabPage.html
